meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the January 19, 2024 Special Called Meeting, January 31, 2024 Special Called Meeting, and February 7, 2024 City Council Meeting

agenda_items.title: Consideration of Appointments
agenda_items.description: Consideration of appointments to boards and commissions and the evaluation and duties of board and commission members (List of nominees is available in the City Secretary's Office)

agenda_items.description: Update on the Five-Year Infrastructure Management Program

agenda_items.title: American Rescue Plan Act (ARPA): Reallocation and Reprogramming
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the reallocation and reprogramming of ARPA funds
